sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO pi_groupall (group_id,comments,search_status,name,search_time,matches,prohibited,test,critical,notice,error,regdate) VALUES (#group_id#,#comments#,#search_status#,#name#,#search_time#,#matches#,#prohibited#,#test#,#critical#,#notice#,#error#,now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regdate=now()

INSERT INTO pi_targets (group_id,target_id,comments,search_status,search_time,name,platform,critical,error,notice,test,prohibited,matchcnt,regdate) VALUES (#group_id#,#target_id#,#comments#,#search_status#,#search_time#,#name#,#platform#,#critical#,#error#,#notice#,#test#,#prohibited#,#matchcnt#,now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE matchcnt=matchcnt, error=#error#, search_status=#search_status#, search_time=#search_time#

INSERT INTO pi_locations (group_id,target_id,location_id,proxy_id,credential_id,search_time,path,protocol,search_status,description,test,prohibited,matchcnt,critical,error,regdate) VALUES (#group_id#,#target_id#,#location_id#,#proxy_id#,#credential_id#,#search_time#,#path#,#protocol#,#search_status#,#description#,#test#,#prohibited#,#matchcnt#,#critical#,#error#,now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE matchcnt=matchcnt

INSERT INTO pi_find (hash_id,group_id, target_id, path, fid,account,owner,regdate,credate) VALUES (#hash_id#,#group_id#,#target_id#,#path#,#fid#,#account#,#owner#,now(),now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE path=#path#, account=#account#, regdate=now()

INSERT INTO pi_subpath (group_id,target_id,parent_id,node_id,info_id,path,account,owner,regdate) VALUES (#group_id#,#target_id#,#parent_id#,#node_id#,#info_id#,#path#,#account#,#owner#,now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regdate=now()

INSERT INTO pi_agents (agent_id,agent_name,agent_type,agent_version,agent_platform,agent_platform_compatibility,agent_verified,agent_connected,agent_proxy,agent_user,agent_cpu,agent_cores,agent_boot,agent_ram,agent_started,agent_connected_ip) VALUES (#agent_id#,#agent_name#,#agent_type#,#agent_version#,#agent_platform#,#agent_platform_compatibility#,#agent_verified#,#agent_connected#,#agent_proxy#,#agent_user#,#agent_cpu#,#agent_cores#,#agent_boot#,#agent_ram#,#agent_started#,#agent_connected_ip#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE agent_connected=#agent_connected#, agent_boot=#agent_boot#, agent_ram=#agent_ram#, agent_started=#agent_started#, agent_connected_ip=#agent_connected_ip#

INSERT INTO pi_agents (agent_id,agent_name,agent_type,agent_version,agent_platform,agent_platform_compatibility,agent_verified,agent_connected,agent_proxy,agent_user,agent_cpu,agent_cores,agent_boot,agent_ram,agent_started,agent_connected_ip) VALUES (#agent_id#,#agent_name#,#agent_type#,#agent_version#,#agent_platform#,#agent_platform_compatibility#,#agent_verified#,#agent_connected#,#agent_proxy#,#agent_user#,#agent_cpu#,#agent_cores#,#agent_boot#,#agent_ram#,#agent_started#,#agent_connected_ip#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE agent_connected=#agent_connected#, agent_boot=#agent_boot#, agent_ram=#agent_ram#, agent_started=#agent_started#
INSERT INTO pi_networks (agent_id,device,ip,mac,regdate) VALUES (#agent_id#,#device#,#ip#,#mac#,now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regdate=now()

INSERT INTO pi_schedules ( schedule_id, schedule_status, schedule_label, schedule_repeat_days, schedule_repeat_months, schedule_datatype_profiles, schedule_next_scan, schedule_target_id, schedule_target_name, schedule_cpu, schedule_capture, schedule_trace, schedule_pause_days, schedule_pause_from, schedule_pause_to, regdate ) VALUES ( #schedule_id#, #schedule_status#, #schedule_label#, #schedule_repeat_days#, #schedule_repeat_months#, #schedule_datatype_profiles#, #schedule_next_scan#, #schedule_target_id#, #schedule_target_name#, #schedule_cpu#, #schedule_capture#, #schedule_trace#, #schedule_pause_days#, #schedule_pause_from#, #schedule_pause_to#, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE schedule_label=#schedule_label#, schedule_status=#schedule_status#, regdate=now()

INSERT INTO pi_scheduled_location (sch_id,target_id,location_id,status,name,started,updated) VALUES (#sch_id#,#target_id#,#location_id#,#status#,#name#,#started#,#updated#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status=#status#

INSERT INTO pi_summary (group_id,target_id,object_id,data_type,match_count,remediation_status,purge_count) VALUES (#group_id#,#target_id#,#object_id#,#data_type#,#match_count#,#remediation_status#,#purge_count#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE match_count=#match_count#, remediation_status=#remediation_status#, purge_count=#purge_count#

INSERT INTO pi_datatypes (datatype_id,datatype_label,version,owner,modified,defaults,disabled,global,sealed) VALUES (#datatype_id#,#datatype_label#,#version#,#owner#,#modified#,#defaults#,#disabled#,#global#,#sealed#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE datatype_label=#datatype_label#, version=#version#, owner=#owner#, modified=#modified#, defaults=#defaults#, disabled=#disabled#, global=#global#, sealed=#sealed#
